Title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
Writer: Nikos Kavvadias (short story "Li"), Marion Hänsel, Louis Grospierre
Actors: Stephen Rea, Ling Chu, Adrian Brine, Maka Kotto
Plot: The film tells the story of a strange friendship between an adult, already on the return of his path of life, and a Chinese girl who just begins her path. Nikos is the radio operator of a merchant ship and has just arrived in Hong-Kong. He is tired and wants to forget his problems by smoking opium. Innocence and hope turns to him in the person of Li, a Chinese girl who lives in a Sampan (a houseboat) and has to clean boats and empty trash-cans to survive.
